org.apache.openjpa.persistence.jdbc
Annotation Type XMappingOverride

@Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface XMappingOverride

Allows override of complex embedded or superclass mappings.

Since:
0.4.0, 1.1.0
Author:
Abe White
